name: AXEMBLER
description:
In one application, you have a collection of small games at your disposal
single game level, i.e. without particular changes in the environment
and without the possibility of saving.
In this first version there are two games.
You can read a brief description of the games below:

ASTEROID APPROACH:
Your spaceship crosses the asteroid belt
and is constantly threatened with a possible collision.
The number of asteroids increases progressively increasing the difficulty of the game.
Avoid the asteroids and hit them with your spaceship armament.

SNOWMAN:
A snowman seeks shelter from an incessant snowfall.
Dogs and birds get in the way of the snowman who defends himself by throwing snowballs.
Meanwhile, some little friends help him along the way.
